thread.section_title: Clanwarz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clanwarz | www.clanwarz.com
thread.title: Marc V

author: Marc V
title: Marc V
text:
Clanwarz have a great range of different servers and a great range of locations where they can get hosted from.
I myself live in Denmark and got a server from the country, which is pretty impressive since the datacenters over here is expensive.
My server has a good ping, and I can do whatever I want with it. I can use their own Control Panel to control the server, and they have FTP access to configure the files easily.
Clanwarz has a FastDL system, which you can sync up with your files by a click of a button.
I had some trouble with some CS:GO plugins files, where my files wouldn't download to the user properly, so I wrote to the support and they answered within 24 hours (often within 1 hour). And they made sure it worked.
(I've had some hosts that didn't care about such problems and would just say it was my problem. - But Clanwarz helped me in a perfect way, and that's what you call customer service)
Lets sum it up:
+ Great Ping/Locations
+ Much Control
+ Great Support
If you are trying to find a host for your game- and/or voiceserver, then I would recommend Clanwarz.
- Marc
